tool_description: Aggregates all reading entries for a specific date into daily summary statistics and progress metrics.

tracking_date.description: Date to calculate daily progress for

error_messages: Invalid tracking_date: Must be a valid date-time string in ISO 8601 format
Future date error: Cannot track progress for dates in the future
No data available: No reading entries found for the specified date
usage: Provide a tracking_date to get aggregated daily reading statistics. The tool will summarize all reading sessions for that date.

total_pages.description: Total pages read on the specified date

total_minutes.description: Total minutes spent reading on the specified date

books_started.description: Number of new books started on this date

books_completed.description: Number of books finished on this date

chapters_completed.description: Number of chapters completed on this date

daily_goal_met.description: Whether daily reading goals were achieved
